checkbox.name: Time Bar
checkbox.desc: If enabled, it'll show a bar that tracks the current song position, as well as its percentage from completion.

checkbox.name: xBRZ Shader
checkbox.desc: If enabled, it'll smooth and connect every sprite's pixel, creating a pseudo scaled version of the original sprite. (WARNING 1: The effect causes a lot of lag on weak machines!) (WARNING 2: The effect is a bit broken!)
